text: Peropteryx is a genus of 5 species of bat in the family Emballonuridae, namely: *Greater dog-like bat (Peropteryx kappleri) *White-winged dog-like bat (Peropteryx leucoptera) *Lesser dog-like bat (Peropteryx macrotis) *Pale- winged dog-like bat (Peropteryx pallidoptera) *Trinidad dog-like bat (Peropteryx trinitatis) ==References== Category:Emballonuridae Category:Bat genera Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Peters
title: Peropteryx
